position: BTSA @ZS | Dare2Compete Top 30 Competitive Leaders E-School 2021

experience.title: Business Technology Solutions Associate
experience.description: •	Developed and implemented customer journey strategies using SFMC to drive pharmaceutical marketing campaigns, integrating key technologies such as SQL, AWS, Python, and SSJS.•	Led the design and development of a Consent Management Preference Center in SFMC, improving client experience by managing preferences for over 40 million healthcare professionals and patients.•	Managed cross-functional teams of 5 in optimizing campaign operations, delivering  reduction in process time through workflow improvements, automation, and strategic planning.

experience.title: Retail Tech Analyst Intern
experience.description: •	Analyzed customer behavior trends in the retail sector across Europe, US, and Asian markets, informing data-driven strategy decisions.•	Conducted secondary research and feasibility analysis on the potential growth of the Thrasio  model in India.
